question: what is the origin of COVID-19
narrative: seeking range of information about the SARS-CoV-2 virus's origin, including its evolution, animal source, and first transmission into humans
qe_wide_search: SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus origin zoonosis bat reservoir pangolin intermediate host phylogenetic MERS-CoV Betacoronavirus evolution
qe_refine_search: SARS-CoV-2 origin zoonotic spillover phylogenetic analysis pangolin reservoir evolutionary host adaptation recombination

question: how does the coronavirus respond to changes in the weather
narrative: seeking range of information about the SARS-CoV-2 virus viability in different weather/climate conditions as well as information related to transmission of the virus in different climate conditions
qe_wide_search: SARS-CoV-2 climate weather temperature humidity seasonality transmission stability viability Betacoronavirus environmental factors
qe_refine_search: SARS-CoV-2 temperature humidity seasonality environmental factors viral persistence epidemiology climate effect

question: will SARS-CoV2 infected people develop immunity? Is cross protection possible?

qe_refine_search: SARS-CoV-2 immune response neutralizing antibodies T-cell cross-reactivity memory protective immunity cross-protection
